attributes.action: Help the great British Pub and stop the present army of organisations trying to close them with endless red tape and accusations of causing social problems when its actually the supermarkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time to stop badgering the hard working licensees of our great traditional public house, with a closier rate of 14 pubs per week where will it end, get behind this cause before theres nothing left

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
